input.sentences: the wife decided she wanted to go hiking .
she took her dog so that he could get exercise as well .
afterwards | they played along the beach .

the dogs settle in on the couch with the husband after a fun day away .
output.sentences: A husband and wife decided to go on a hike.
They brought the dog along so he could get some exercise.
They stopped by the beach to play.
The husband and wife took a selfie together so they could remember their fun hike.
After a fun day they settled in at home and rested.
